name: Bird Bones
descriptionPositive: AGI +4, fall from heights more gradual

name: Chameleon
descriptionPositive: Invisibility while unarmored and standing still
descriptionNegative: Must be unarmored and stationary for effect to work

name: Speed Demon
descriptionNegative: +50% drain on hunger and thirst while moving

name: Talons
descriptionPositive: Punching attacks do 25% more damage + bleed damage

name: Twisted Muscles
descriptionPositive: Melee damage +25%, better chance to cripple limbs

name: Carnivore
descriptionPositive: No disease from meat and 2x bonus to food from eating meat products
descriptionNegative: Eating fruits and vegetables does not satisfy hunger

name: Herbivore
descriptionPositive: Vegetables provide x2 benefit and no disease

name: Plague Walker
descriptionPositive: Poison aura scaling with your diseases

name: Electrically Charged
descriptionNegative: Small amount of damage done to player

name: Unstable Isotope
descriptionPositive: Medium chance to release a radiation blast when struck in melee
descriptionNegative: Minor damage to player during the radiation blast
